text: The Village Teacher () is a 1947 Soviet drama movie directed by Mark Donskoy.СЕЛЬСКАЯ УЧИТЕЛЬНИЦАЖизнь нигде It stars Vera Maretskaya, Pavel Olenev, and Daniil Sagal. == Actors == * Vera Maretskaya as Varvara Vasilievna Martynova * Pavel Olenev as Igor Petrovich, school custodian * Daniil Sagal as Sergei Martinov * Vladimir Lepeshinsky as Voronov * Vladimir Maruta as Voronov, a gold miner * Vladimir Belokurov as Bukov, a gold miner == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1947 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Donskoy Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Village Teacher
